segments.text: Could you make up this prescription for me , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . I'll do it for you right away . Sorry the drugs on this order are out of stock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you prefer to take similar medicine of other brands ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . I recommend this medicine . It's the same medicine , same quality , at a much lower cost . And it helps just as much . In fact , you'll feel better just by saving the money , I promise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I'll take this brand . And how do I take these medicines ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is for internal use . Two tablets , four times a day .
segments.speaker: S2
